      • generatePlaneSet

        public static com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector3[] generatePlaneSet(com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector3 offset,
                                               com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector3 d1,
                                               com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector3 d2,
                                               int minSize,
                                               int maxSize,
                                               float minScalar,
                                               float maxScalar)
        Parameters:
        offset - offset vector of plane
        d1 - direction vector of plane
        d2 - direction vector of plane
        minSize - minimum size of added points
        maxSize - maximum size of added points
        minScalar - minimum scalar applied to direction vectors
        maxScalar - maximum scalar applied to direction vectors
        Returns:
        a set of points lying in a plane of size in [minSize + 3, maxSize + 3]
